short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In reference to Bill O'Reilly's tirade about being called a human picketing sign one time, this extension goes a step further.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Since Bill O'Reilly has such a hard time taking a joke:

http://video.foxnews.com/v/3233837134001/avoid-smear-websites-/#sp=show-clips

(Watch the video, it's really great)

I figured we'd pile on a little bit.

This extension turns mentions of Bill O'Reilly on the web into Human Picketing Sign Bill O'Reilly.
